question: What is the difference between PIM-SM and PIM-DM?
options: PIM-SM uses flood-and-prune while PIM-DM uses shared trees
PIM-DM uses shortest path trees initially, while PIM-SM uses only shared trees
PIM-SM and PIM-DM are identical in operation
PIM-SM uses shared trees initially and switches to shortest path trees, while PIM-DM floods traffic and prunes unwanted branches

What does IGMP snooping do?
options: Reduces multicast flooding by tracking group memberships at Layer 2
